snippet: The photographer Collier Schorr likes to mix it up with her images.
abstract: Photographer Collier Schorr, who has made career of skating between worlds, removing boundaries of masculine and feminine in art and fashion, likes to mix it up with her images; works in 8 Women, her 10th exhibition at 303 Gallery in Chelsea, are mostly photos she has been taking at fashion shoots since 1996, yet none feel dated or of particular season.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Collier Schorr likes to mix it up with her images.
